Command of Server

# Status of server
[root@sw-evt ~]# service ypserv status
ypserv (pid  2681) is running...


[root@sw-evt ~]# rpcinfo -u localhost ypserv
program 100004 version 1 ready and waiting
program 100004 version 2 ready and waiting
